title: Futbol Americas: Juan Carlos Osorio Joins the FA Table
description:
On today’s episode of Futbol Americas Seb and Herc are joined by former Mexico National Team head coach Juan Carlos Osorio to talk about his time with El Tri as well as to preview the El Trafico playoff game between LAFC and L.A. Galaxy. Club América falls to Toluca in the first leg of the Liga MX semifinal; did Toluca blew their chance to knock out the Aguila? FC Dallas advance to the Western Conference semifinals but Jesus Ferreira made the headlines after a terrible miss. Will that cost him a starting spot with USMNT? Wrexham advance to the FA Cup First Round and so much more!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: On Thursday’s episode of Futbol Americas, Sebastian Salazar and Herculez Gomez, LIVE from the Los Angeles studios, had a especial guest: former Mexico National Team head coach JUAN CARLOS OSORIO.
